name: Slava KPSS
description: '''Vyacheslav Valeryevich Mashnov''' ({{Langx|ru|Вячеслав Валерьевич Машнов}}; born 9 May 1990), best known by his stage name '''Slava KPSS'''{{efn|See other stage names below in the [[#Stage names|§Stage names]] section}} (Слава КПСС) is a Russian [[Hip hop music|hip-hop]] artist and streamer.
